resources.string: Logo for the Four Fours app
Operation 2\nPrevious + Middle Next | Right Half Together Next

This is Four Fours, a simple math game where the goal is to create any number you choose using only 4 of number and a limited set of mathematical operations. Try to solve as many as possible, and see how how many times the number has been gotten by everyone with the app as well.


This app was created in under 24 hours at CodeDay Spring 2018 by Robert Marzec, with help from Joshua Garza.


If this project at all interests you, feel free to check it out at my GitHub page (github.com/rjmarzec), and if you have any comments, questions, or concerns, don't be afraid to shoot me an email at robertmarzecj@gmail.com. 
I hope you enjoy!
